data.text: @CDCDirector You just removed red as a color from the map so it looks better 🤣

@CDCDirector Trained with you at MGH and am really perplexed by your policy decisions since Delta. Now am totally lost by this new guidance. Feels like you cherry picked the data until it allowed for you declare 70percent of the US low risk.
@CDCDirector Everything looks like a win if you just change the colors.
@weezyfuhreezy @CDCDirector they realized Q1 ends this month

@Altair4_2381 @ChadGoldsmith @CDCDirector Gotta use your own common sense and protect yourself. They don’t have individuals’ interests at heart. Just corporations’ and the economy, and kowtowing to public pressure from an ignorant, whiny public.
@Altair4_2381 @JudgyRants @CDCDirector And, how much worse will it actually have to get for them to tell us to put them back on?  Nearly 2K people died yesterday…

@JudgyRants @ChadGoldsmith @CDCDirector That’s another upsetting aspect of this I hadn’t thought of: if they’re telling me unmask now when that’s obviously unsafe, how will I actually know when it’s really safe to unmask?
